metadata.dc:author: Ayuso Mateos, J L
Ramos Brieva, J A
Cordero Villafáfila, A
metadata.dc:description: The authors have investigated the real existence of "distinct quality" of pathological sadness in depressed subjects. This paper, show a discriminant function that recognize the "distinct quality" with a 100% of cases correctly classified.
metadata.dc:title: La distinta cualidad del ánimo deprimido. I: Mito o realidad? (un estudio controlado).
[The distinctive quality of depressed mood. I: Is it a myth or a reality? (a controlled study)].
metadata.dc:publisher: Actas luso-espanolas de neurologia, psiquiatria y ciencias afines
